Text:
Will not play either on computer or in standalone player.

Could someone please explain how they managed to play there's.

Thank you.

This is a DVD-Audio disc. Not a regular DVD-Video. You need to have the proper playback equipment to listen to this properly. This is a direct rip from my master DVD-A disc. There should be no problems with playback.
The disc will play on your PC using Foobar and the DVD-Audio plug-in.
